Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Cyndia Sweet "-Cynderella"
Reviews.Content: Easy to mount, GREAT Picture and great sound, AND it has the remote codes that work with Directv remotes :)

Reviews.Title: WHAT A DEAL!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kevin D
Reviews.Content: This MAGNAVOX 39" LED TV, (1080P 60HZ 3-HDMI 1-USB PC 1-Component) was originally $142,501.72 !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I don't quite get the math, but apparently you save 100% according to this listing!!!!All I can say is WOW!!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
HD Edge-Lit LED LCD display
Resolution 1920 x 1080 - 1080p
TV formats supported: 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, 480i
Convenient side HDMI input - 3 HDMI inputs total
ProductInfo.Name: 39"LED HDTV,1080p,60Hz,3-HDMI,1-USB,PC,1-Component,Slim Bezel & Chasis
